name: df-tayl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(ctayl, cmpo(s0, s1, cpr(cr, cc), co(cc, cpm, cv(s0)), cmpo(s2, s3, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf)), ciin(s4, cin(co(nat0, cicc, cv(s2)), cz), cdm(cfv(co(cv(s0), cdvn, cv(s1)), cv(s4)))), ciun(s5, cc, cxp(csn(cv(s5)), co(ccnfld, ctsu, cmpt(s4, cin(co(nat0, cicc, cv(s2)), cz), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(cv(s0), cdvn, cv(s1)), cv(s4)), cv(s3)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s4))), cmul, co(co(cv(s5), cmin, cv(s3)), cexp, cv(s4))))))))))
comment: Define the Taylor polynomial or Taylor series of a function. TODO-AV: ` n e. ( NN0 u. { +oo } ) ` should be replaced by ` n e. NN0* ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)
